statements: SELECT * FROM lighting_patterns;
SELECT pattern_id, date, time FROM lighting_patterns WHERE light_intensity > 0.5;
SELECT pattern_id, energy_consumption FROM lighting_patterns WHERE date = '2023-10-15' AND time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '16:00:00';
SELECT * FROM lighting_patterns WHERE energy_consumption < 10.0 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT AVG(light_intensity), MAX(energy_consumption) FROM lighting_patterns;
SELECT pattern_id, date, time, light_intensity, energy_consumption FROM lighting_patterns ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_patterns WHERE light_intensity > 50 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC, date ASC;
SELECT AVG(light_intensity), MAX(energy_consumption) FROM lighting_patterns;
SELECT pattern_id, date, time, energy_consumption FROM lighting_patterns WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND energy_consumption < 500 ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;

SELECT COUNT(pattern_id) AS total_patterns, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_energy_consumption FROM lighting_patterns GROUP BY date HAVING total_energy_consumption > 1000 ORDER BY total_energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_patterns;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_duration FROM lighting_patterns WHERE lighting_id = 1;
SELECT trend_name, trend_result FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT room_id FROM lighting_patterns;
SELECT AVG(trend_result) FROM trend_analysis;
SELECT * FROM lighting_patterns WHERE room_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC, pattern_duration ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_duration FROM lighting_patterns WHERE pattern_duration > 30 AND start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT room_id, COUNT(pattern_name) AS num_patterns FROM lighting_patterns GROUP BY room_id HAVING num_patterns > 1 ORDER BY room_id;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_result > 0.5 ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_date >= '2022-06-01' AND trend_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lighting_patterns;
SELECT id, location, pattern FROM lighting_patterns WHERE intensity > 0.5;
SELECT trend_id, start_date, end_date FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT efficiency_id, trend_id, efficiency_rating FROM energy_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating < 3.0;
SELECT pattern, location, intensity, timestamp FROM lighting_patterns WHERE location = 'Bedroom';
SELECT id, location, pattern, intensity, timestamp FROM lighting_patterns WHERE intensity > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT trend_id, pattern_id, start_date, end_date, trend FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend = 'Positive' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT id, location, pattern, intensity, timestamp FROM lighting_patterns WHERE location = 'Office' AND pattern = 'Strobe' ORDER BY intensity DESC;
SELECT trend_id, pattern_id, start_date, end_date, trend FROM trend_analysis WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT efficiency_id, efficiency_rating, trend_id FROM energy_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.7 ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_patterns;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name FROM lighting_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM location_details WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_value > 1000;
SELECT location_id, trend_type, trend_value FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY trend_value DESC, analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_patterns WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT pattern_name, start_time, end_time FROM lighting_patterns WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT location_name, region FROM location_details WHERE location_id IN (3, 4) AND region = 'North';
SELECT consumption_value FROM energy_consumption WHERE location_id = 5 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT trend_type, AVG(trend_value) AS average_value FROM trend_analysis GROUP BY trend_type ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM LightingPatterns;
SELECT location, brightness FROM LightingPatterns WHERE brightness > 50 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT date, time FROM LightingPatterns WHERE location = 'Office' ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE analysis_status = 'completed';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM LocationInfo WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM LightingPatterns ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, brightness FROM LightingPatterns WHERE brightness > 0.5 AND location = 'Office';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE analysis_status = 'Pending';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM LocationInfo WHERE city = 'New York' OR country = 'USA';
SELECT pattern_id, efficiency_score FROM EnergyEfficiency WHERE efficiency_score BETWEEN 0.7 AND 0.9 ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
